body:
### Stance Detection in Tweets: Yes or No?
This is the project page for [SemEval 2016 task 6](http://alt.qcri.org/semeval2016/task6/): Detecting Stance in Tweets.

### Initial Assumptions:
* A topic, a piece of text, mentions and hashtags are given. The question is whether the tweet is in favour, against or neutral about the topic.
* Baseline 1: Train a text-based classifier over all training samples regardless of their topic and test it on development data.
